Html:
Is there a property to set for the stroke of the route to make the line smooth. The way I have it currently, the line looks kind of jagged. I guess it looks like the actual pixels being shown on the line. If the line is completely vertical or horizontal, then it looks perfect but if it is not, then it's not perfect.

Just wanted to know if there was a way around this.

This is all I am setting for the route
gr = new GMapRoute(points, "route");
gr.Stroke = new Pen(Color.Magenta, 2);
